item.title: AZN
item.description: score:73 Chances: AstraZeneca’s acquisition of Fusion Biopharma for $21 per share in cash, along with a contingent value right of $3 per share, indicates strategic growth and expansion in the pharmaceutical industry. GSK’s plan to lower the prices of its inhaled respiratory products to $35 per month in the US in 2025 could lead to increased market share and customer loyalty.
